column4: I'm trying to install maya 2008 64 bit RPM package and I got error /bin/sh is needed by AWCommon-10.80-15.x86_64
what can I do about /bin/sh is needed by AWCommon-10.80-15.x86_64 error? /bin/sh isn't missing, what's wrong with it?
go into synaptic and so a search for  awcommon
missing dependency ? probably a python package
